item.description:
Welcome to Westborough Spirituality meeting group.

Last month, we had a great meeting. Thanks to Andrea, Cris, Fred, Jan, Chiu-hui and Shang-sheng.
We discussed a story about a monk who transformed his mindset. When we change our mind, everything seems so different. How can we learn from the kids and also practice all the knowledges into our life...etc.

This month's meeting, we can share more about our spiritual life and How we practice in our daily life!

I would like to welcome all the friends with peaceful mind to join!

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

Happy Father's day

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: 147 will be the second building on your R. hand side after drive into condos.
item.name: The Westborough Spirituality June Meetup
